name: Healthcare
characteristics: Hospitals, pharma, medical devices, health insurance
common_synergies: EHR consolidation, clinical systems, pharmacy benefits, medical device rationalization

name: Technology
characteristics: SaaS, hardware, IT services, software development
common_synergies: Cloud infrastructure, data center, R&D consolidation, product roadmap rationalization

name: Financial Services
common_synergies: Branch consolidation, trading systems, regulatory compliance, treasury operations

name: Manufacturing
characteristics: Discrete and process manufacturing, industrial equipment
common_synergies: Plant footprint, supply chain, procurement, distribution networks

name: Retail
common_synergies: Store footprint, e-commerce platforms, merchandising systems, supply chain
